Name: Voxel Modeler 2
Description: Open source free software made in javascript to create voxel art.

Name: Magic DOM
Description: Frontend library that allow you to use jsx syntax.

Name: Super Canvas
Description: lightweight extension of the html canvas, that allow you to draw and interact with shapes in a intuitive way.

Name: Graph coloring
Description: interactive graph editor that colors the graph with the least amount of colors possible so there is no node with the same color connected

Name: Knapsack
Description: Given limited cost select the items that makes the most value

Name: Procedural fragment bold shader
Description: Using only fragment shader, make the image of a text appear bold

Name: Voxel modeler
Description: Create voxel models, and export them as geometry. Made in web gl.

Name: Voxel geometry reduction
Description: A test project, made to solve a part of the problem of converting voxel data into optimized geometry

Name: String interpolation
Description: This is a little more advanced string interpolation
